        Description copied from interface: HumanAgent

      • doTurn

        public MancalaAgentAction doTurn(int computationTime,
                                 MancalaGame game)
        Description copied from interface: Agent
        Should calculate the turn. It may take computationTime many seconds and has a Game as its input. Calculation is not done on the main ui thread, instead on a background thread. You are allowed to alter the Game objects state.
        Specified by:
        doTurn in interface Agent<MancalaGame,MancalaAgentAction>
        Parameters:
        computationTime - given calculation time in seconds
        game - given game (with mutable state)
        Returns:
        action that should be done for the current turn.
